hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #Double Defense#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bomb Bag#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Purple Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Poacher's Saw#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #3# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the earth is round.^Just like pizza.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Poacher's Saw#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that playing #Sun's Song# in a grave spawns #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Fire Keese Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #the Market#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #1# major item.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Arrows# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a small #Fairy Fountain#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bomb Bag#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Lobby Right Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Morpha#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bottom of the Well Compass#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a hero ventures #beyond the wasteland# to learn #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Saria's Song#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern MQ Torch Puzzle Room Chest

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #a Heart Container# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bottom of the Well Compass#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that racing #Damp's ghost# rewards...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Recovery Heart#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #the Requiem of Spirit#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a small #Fairy Fountain#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Piece of Heart#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Saria's Song#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Forest Temple# is a foolish choice.
